name: Domaine de Larchey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent four lovely nights at Domaine de Larchey. This is a beautifully decorated B&B and we were fortunate to get the ground floor "family room" which was a suite with a fabulous marble bathroom. This is a very stylish, yet casual environment.. The setting is parklike with large gardens, absolutely quiet. Located in the Graves region, it is only 15 minutes from the center of Bordeaux and easy commuting to St. Emilion and the Medoc. There are chateaux and gardens galore to visit, with stunning small village churches and stone architecture. We only wished we had more tme to explore the area.
reviews.title: Delightful estate in pastoral setting close to Bordeaux

reviews.text: But what makes a B&B experience great? Marie Cecile is the most charming hostess. We had a wonderful dinner she catered for the guests one evening, a very enjoyable night. The other nights we dined at restaurants in villages not more than 15 minutes away, including Montesquieu, a true gourmet experience. M Cecile speaks excellent English and everything from booking to departure was gracious and flawless. A real French country experience
reviews.title: Superb!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a superb 3 night stay at le domaine de larchey and can say nothing but good things!
reviews.title: excellent - beautiful genuine french experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is fantastic for exploring some of the best parts of France and the welcome and service received was just perfect. Marie-cecille and all of the staff/family are so accommodating, organising things and providing excellent recommendations on places of interest.
reviews.title: Perfect accomodation, wonderful hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently spent 3 nights here as part of our honeymoon and we can definitely recommend this hotel. The setting is lovely it's about 20 mins south of Bordeaux and on a large property with tennis courts, horses and lovely gardens. There aren't many rooms which is nice and each has its own distinct theme (ours was purple). Comfortable beds and spacious rooms, as well as good water pressure.
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic

reviews.text: Marie Cécile went out of her way to help us enjoy our stay in Bordeaux, including making restaurant reservations and ensuring we always had a vegetarian meal available, and suggesting sight seeing options. Breakfast on site was delicious and we enjoyed the dinner we had there as well, good food at a reasonable price. She also speaks perfect English and although I enjoy practising my French it did make things easier.
reviews.title: Excellent place with very attentive and courteous service. See you again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am still thinking of the great time I had at the Domaine de Larchey. I fully enjoyed my stay in the very professionally and lovely renovated Domaine and its garden. The attentive and caring staff completed my positive picture. I also profited from the nearby village of Martillac where you can find next to a Grand Cru vindyard also some hidden stars of the Pessac-Leongnon region. The Domaine de Larchey was also very supportive in arranging some visits. Thank you and hope to come back soon!
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful place, fantastic hospitality, excellent location. We absolutely loved it and will be back! Thank you for making our stay so wonderful.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay for discovering Bordeaux

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for a couple of nights in order to visit Bordeaux. The rooms were excellent and the ambience, owner and staff exceptional. A short train ride from the local station takes you into the heart of the city, where you can take a tram or walk. Looking forward to our next visit.
reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way
